Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Turn
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicRemove, BasicTurn, BuildEffect, MoveEffect, WinEffect
public abstract class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
Turn class represents a generic turn that must be specialized with a card effect

      public Cell[][] generateRemoveMatrix​(Worker selectedWorker)
      Allows you to generate a RemoveMatrix without cells where there is a player or ground (Basic remove)
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - is the worker selected by the current player
      Returns:
      return the RemoveMatrix

    • removeBlock

      public void removeBlock​(Worker selectedWorker, int delBlockRow, int delBlockCol)
      Allows you to Remove in cell(delBlockRow,delBlockCol) the Latest Block of the Tower
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - is the worker selected by the current player
      delBlockRow - is the x coordinate of the block to be deleted
      delBlockCol - is the y coordinate of the block to be deleted

    • changeWorkerPlayer

      public Worker changeWorkerPlayer​(Worker selectedWorker)
      Allows you to change selectedWorker with the other worker that has not been moved Attention: you can't choose the next worker, is the next of the list playerWorkers (in Player) Attention2: don't launch this method if you have only 1 worker (check)
      Parameters:
      selectedWorker - is the worker selected by the current player
      Returns:
      return the new Worker (different from input selectedWorker)
